title: The Key Types of Power of Attorney Explained: A Comprehensive Overview
description: In estate planning, understanding the various types of Power of Attorney (POA) is crucial for making informed decisions about how to manage your affairs if you become unable to do so yourself. This article provides a detailed explanation of different types of POAs, helping you decide which might best suit your needs.
